attributes.action: 2nd EU referendum as the changes a leave result would enact were not defined.
attributes.additional_details: Before this second referendum such claims like £350 million a week should be cleared up as I believe that the people who were under informed voted based of that number alone. Already the pound has plumited before slowly recovering and the price of gold has risen 7% this shows that people who are wealthy no longer trust the British Pound and are instead buying gold as it is a more stable currency currently, this is bad for the British economy if we have some of the wealthy leaving.
attributes.background: There should be a 2nd EU referendum as the public weren't given a full definition of what leave would mean.  This has led to a result based on unclear claims made by both sides, and therefore we should have a revote once this has been defined and made clear to the public.
